name: European Newspaper Publishers' Association
memberOrga:
ENPA members are available at:
https://www.enpa.eu/members/
goal: The European Newspaper Publishers' Association (ENPA) is the voice of the newspaper publishing industry in Europe. ENPA represents the interests of European newspaper and news media publishers working on all platforms, both print and digital.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation
euInitiatives: Freedom of Press and Media Pluralism, Digital single market, Copyright, Advertising,  Consumer rights,  Sportsâ€™ rights, VAT, Media Literacy, Sustainability, Market research on the industry.
